items.text: full on off stump, defends
items.shortText: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: flicks the length ball on middle stump through square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, defends
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: gets forward to the pitch of the ball on off stump and blocks
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: drives to cover
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: blocks on middle
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: drives strongly to long-on
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full and outside off, he cracks it to the right of cover
items.postText: Zillur Rahman : "A real good test for the middle orderTigers. So far they r not yet tested in the series. Let's see if they can prove them. "
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Salin: "Mithun was the only batsman who looked solid in New Zealand earlier this year before he was ruled out due to injury. He is the one I am looking forward to in the CWC. "
items.text: dabs the shortish delivery outside off to backward point
items.shortText: Holder to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: looks to punch a rising delivery outside off over the covers, but the extra bounce from the very tall Holder makes him skew the shot over point
items.shortText: Holder to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: works the length ball on middle behind square leg
items.postText: Ravindra: "@Abhijato -- that is an awesome list... Never thought about teams that way, but you've changed my perception! If only Awesome was a musical genre, you and your Crystal Ball would top the charts in that one... Carry on with your wonderful comments (full of insight and accurate predictions), makes the experience on Cricinfo a better one every time. Regards, a fellow fan :)"
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: beats him with an offcutter that stays low. Mushfiqur is set up for the glide to third man but it doesn't come out right
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: strays on the pads and Mushfiqur deflects it away to the long leg boundary. Cricket 101
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: gets the back of a length ball to straighten and Mushfiqur guides it off the open face to deep third man
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: strong shot - getting down low to a length ball outside off and sweeping it in front of square leg. A Mushfiqur special
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: walks across his stumps and gets cramped up as Allen pulls his length back and keeps it on off stump. Mushfiqur can only block
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: drives a tossed up delivery outside off to cover
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: now behind square, the sweep shot with great class. And the reason he goes behind square is because WI put a fielder in front. So now, when he gets across his stumps and gets on top of the ball, he rolls his wrists specifically so he can place it in the newly created gap.
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: good length outside off, defends
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: goes back to a good length ball that skids onto off stump. There's danger here for Mushfiqur but his hands help him adjust quickly enough
items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: poor bowling again from West Indies. The captain now straying onto the pads with fine leg up. What do you think happened next? (Hint, leg glance for four)
items.shortText: Holder to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: huge appeal for lbw, and with Mithun always going across his stumps, he's always going to be candidate for that. But here the indipper might just have gone down leg
items.shortText: Holder to Mohammad Mithun, 1 leg bye

items.text: back of a length ball climbs up on Mushfiqur, but he blunts it well to point
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and outside off, he blocks in front of point
items.postText: Sajib: "Still Bangladesh's game to loose, and they are pretty adept in doing that." --- Sounds like years of bad experiences behind that comment. Chin up though. They're doing this sensibly
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: blocks the shortish delivery on off stump
items.shortText: Holder to Mohammad Mithun, no run
